sub_title: Lead Software Developer at Yard | Digital agency
summary:
Experienced software developer with a love for building great applications and solving complex problems in a variety of domains. Always trying to find ways to express my creativity and learning new things. 

Driven by a strong curiosity and eagerness to learn I started to self-study computer programming when I was 12 years old. Over the years I‚Äôve harnessed strong autodidactic skills which allowed me to land a job as a full-stack developer right after finishing high school. 

I‚Äôve been honing my skills ever since through work experience, reading, experimenting, and courses. 
Check out my Goodreads profile at https://goodreads.com/melvinkoopmans for an overview of the books that I've read.

awards:
[{'title': 'Dutch Interactive Awards 2021', 'description': 'The Dutch Interactive Awards (DIA) are the prizes for the very best interactive work by Dutch makers. The DIA presents a gold and silver award within 16 categories to the most prominent agencies and clients. 

Every agency, client, or company in the Netherlands with an impressive interactive project takes part. All cases submitted will be assessed by an independent jury of heavyweights from the digital world. They determine the nominees based on the concept, design and UX, result, and optimization.

We won the Dutch Interactive Award 2021 for the category "Communities" with our online community for the Dutch soccer association KNVB. The platform "E√©n Tweetje" bridges the gap between club directors to stimulate knowledge exchange.

My role in this project was the entire development of this platform, based on our community software "Yunits", of which I am the lead developer. More information about Yunits can be found in the listing of my projects.', 'issuer': 'Dutch Interactive Awards', 'date': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}]

projects:
[{'title': 'Yunits Community Platform', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'description': "I strongly believe in the power of networks and their ability to connect people and knowledge. That's why I was a part of Yard | Digital Agency, where we aimed to build and scale online community using our software Yunits.

An active online community can be a source of inspiration for its participants, allowing them to connect with like-minded individuals, gain access to valuable information, and utilize digital services.

As the lead of the Yunits development team, I was responsible for the following key areas:

‚Ä¢ Architecting and structuring the software's infrastructure
‚Ä¢ Creating a self-driven team with a culture of psychological safety that allows developers to express their creativity and feel like they're part of a larger whole
‚Ä¢ Making trade-offs, iterating, and scaling the software to cater to more online communities
‚Ä¢ Utilizing data science and machine learning to build dynamic online communities and analyze the performance of existing platforms, which aids in decision-making and strategy.", 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Melvin', 'last_name': 'Koopmans', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Lead Software Developer at Yard | Digital agency'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Michali', 'last_name': 'Sarris', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Web Developer at Yard Internet'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Siebe', 'last_name': 'van Schalkwijk', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Project Manager & Product Owner @Yard | Digital Agency'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Raymond', 'last_name': 'Hofman', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Projectmanager bij Yard | Digital Agency'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Emma', 'last_name': 'Mantel', 'name': None, 'headline': 'UX & Visual Designer bij Yard Internet'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Dennis', 'last_name': 'Van Aalst', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Director & Digital strategist @ Yard | Digital agency'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Mak', 'last_name': 'Maris', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Full stack web developer bij Yard | Digital Agency'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Mike', 'last_name': 'van Gelder', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Web Developer'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'John', 'last_name': 'Goes', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Yard Internet'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Jolien', 'last_name': 'van der Kemp', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Projectmanager bij Yard | Digital Agency'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Oscar', 'last_name': 'M√ºller', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Crybersecurity expert en network engineer. Werkzaam bij de Politie in de Young Professional Pool - ICT'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Emiel', 'last_name': 'Popelier', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Full Stack-ontwikkelaar'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Tamara', 'last_name': 'S.', 'name': None, 'headline': '....'}]}, {'title': 'MijnNSPOH - Digital Learning Environment', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'description': 'NSPOH trains people to become skilled and inspiring employees. Doctors, social nurses, occupational health and safety consultants, prevention workers, administrators, managers ... Entrepreneurial professionals who add value to the professional company where they work. 

We set out to design and build their new digital learning environment from scratch. Some of the key features are:
‚Ä¢ Supporting well over 16.000 participants
‚Ä¢ Deep integration with AFAS Profit ERP
‚Ä¢ 360-degree feedback between participants and educators, participants can also invite external users to contribute to their assignments
‚Ä¢ Calendar, notifications and news
‚Ä¢ Management system for educators, to keep track of their participants and evaluations.
‚Ä¢ Integration with external Moodle learning environment

As the tech lead of this project I primarily worked on:
‚Ä¢ The architectural design and implementation of the front- and backend application. We applied Domain-Driven Design and used the following technological stack: Symfony Framework, React, TypeScript, MySQL 8.0, Redis, and RabbitMQ
‚Ä¢  Determining project requirements and management of the development team', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Melvin', 'last_name': 'Koopmans', 'name': None, Consultant'}]}, {'title': 'NRZ Diplomazwemmen', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'description': "I served as the lead developer for the Nationale Raad Zwemveiligheid (NRZ / National Swimming Safety Board) project, which aimed to elevate swimming safety in the Netherlands to the highest possible level. The NRZ's goal was to ensure that everyone could safely enjoy the water without the risk of drowning. To this end, they wanted us to build an application that would help them take and evaluate exams related to swimming safety.

In my role, I was responsible for a number of critical tasks that ensured the project's success. I designed the application's architecture, helping to establish the technical framework that would enable us to achieve our objectives. I also helped the development team operate at their highest potential, mentoring other developers and ensuring that everyone was equipped to perform at their best.

Code quality was a top priority for me, and I established coding standards and performed regular code reviews to ensure that we were producing the highest-quality code possible. We also used automated testing tools to catch errors before they could cause any issues.

Finally, I served as a key liaison between the development team and stakeholders, communicating project updates and addressing any concerns that arose.", 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Melvin', 'last_name': 'Koopmans', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Lead Software Developer at Yard | Digital agency'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Marc', 'last_name': 'Schwartz', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Full Stack Developer at Yard Internet'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Tamara', 'last_name': 'S.', 'name': None, 'headline': '....'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Siebe', 'last_name': 'van Schalkwijk', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Project Manager & Product Owner @Yard | Digital Agency'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Daniel', 'last_name': 'Koopmans', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Available ‚úîÔ∏è | Data, DevOps, Platform Engineer ‚öôÔ∏è | Innovative üí°'}]}, {'title': 'Invisalign', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'description': "I've contributed to the further development of the Invisalign Gallery Platform and build other internal Invisalign web applications. The application allows students to take tests to see how they perform and can improve on their mental and physical health, alcohol and drug use, sexuality, and other things that are relevant for people between the age of 12 and 25.

I've been deeply involved in the entire development process, working on:
‚Ä¢ Data analysis, visualization (with D3.js) and report generation for school managers and admins.
‚Ä¢ The back-end API built on top of Symfony, which provides the necessary data and rules for taking tests, authentication, processing of test results, data analysis, and CMS capabilities for admins and schoolmanagers.
‚Ä¢ The front-end client built with Vue.js. We used service workers to ensure that the app works when the user is offline.", 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Melvin', 'last_name': 'Koopmans', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Lead Software Developer at Yard | Digital agency'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Michali', 'last_name': 'Sarris', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Web Developer at Yard Internet'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Jolien', 'last_name': 'van der Kemp', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Projectmanager bij Yard | Digital Agency'}]}, {'title': 'Allesoversport.nl', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'description': "Allesoversport is an online platform integrating all knowledge about sport and movement.
